name: Michael GRIFFIN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Griffin v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Michael GRIFFIN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
It is hereby ordered that the Order of the Commonwealth Court granting mandamus relief is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
915 A.2d 639
Michael GRIFFIN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 20, 2007.
